text: Jibun no oshie o, asobi ya tawamure to suru mono to, gense no seikatsu ni azamuka rete iru-sha-tachi wa, hanatte oki nasai. Soshite kaku hito wa sono okonai ni yotte, mizukara hametsu ni ochīru koto o sore de kunkai shi nasai. Arrā no soto ni wa, don'na gādian mo torinasu mono mo nai. Subete no daishō o teishutsu shite mo, ukeire rarenaidearou. Korera no mono wa jibun no okonatta koto ni yotte horobi,-nushi o kyohi shita tame ni nietatta yu o nomi, mata tsūretsuna chōbatsu o ukerudearou
